Activities:
Community resources and referrals for basic needs and stabilization (housing, food assistance, healthcare, child care, government-issued or state IDs, government services, legal aid, substance abuse support, family support)

Critical document support 

Provide donated essential items and personal care items

Resource navigation education
Output:
Referrals provided by category (number of)
IDs obtained by youth (number of)
Immediate Outcomes <1year:
Increased access to health care services
Increased access to basic needs
Intermediate Outcomes 1-5 years: Increased ability to navigate and use services
Long-term Outcomes (5-10+ years):
Improved social-emotional well-being 
Increased sense of agency
Increased education attainment 
Increased job stability 
Decreased justice system involvement

Strategy: Mental health and trauma recovery support
Activities:
Mental health meeting and service planning

Adverse Childhood Experience (ACE) screening

Counseling/therapy

Behavioral and emotional screening
Output:
Mental health service plans (number of) 
Individual therapy sessions (number of)
Group therapy sessions (number of)  
Behavioral screenings (number of) 
Interns with ACE screenings (percent of)
ACEs score (average)
Restorative circles (number of)
Immediate Outcomes <1year:
Improved social-emotional skills
Improved self-esteem and self-efficacy 
Improved conflict management skills
Intermediate Outcomes 1-5 years:
Increase in healthy relationships 
High school graduation or GED attainment
Increased credential attainment

Activities:
Goal setting and support

Enrichment participation (community activities like attending a musical, visiting a museum, etc.)

Youth empowerment and education (education on rights, address discrimination, navigating systems, prevent predatory, for-profit education schemes, etc.)

Financial education (personal budget, bank account, Paycheck, payroll and withholding workshops)

Family visits 

Online and social media etiquette

Professional or Transferrable Workplace Skill Development
